review:
Que dire... Si-ce n'est qu'il s'agit d'un excellent jeu.  Certes, le titre semble peu accrocheur, étant un jeu à licence, mais les idées de gameplay et le level-design en font un jeu meilleur que ce qu'il peut sortir aujourd'hui  Un jeu qui correspond bien à l'excellent film du même nom. Je vous le conseil les yeux fermés.
﻿

author: {'steamid': '76561198137804174', 'num_games_owned': 381, 'num_reviews': 58, 'playtime_forever': 507, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 507, 'last_played': 1579649006}
review:
Completed as of writing this review: 100%

One of the best games from my childhood. That's basically a platformer but without jumping. Perhaps it's nostalgia glasses but I really like almost anything in this game! The only problem is collecting all boxes can be a chore if you miss even one in a section throughout the stage. However the game is usually a basic puzzle and the mini-game moments are also fine (my favorite being the high speed stages). That's basically a movie in the whole package, since the cutscenes capture the mood really well! One of three gems, made by Asobo Studio (other being Garfield 2 and Ratatouille, the latter for some reason not released in Steam)! Definitely worth playing to everybody who likes easy to master games!

author: {'steamid': '76561199016558036', 'num_games_owned': 20, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 932, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 265, 'playtime_at_review': 344, 'last_played': 1711580947}
review:
Un juego muy entretenido, tiene muchas mecánicas, se hace bien corto el modo historia, en una tarde te lo puedes pasar tranquilamente. Lo jugaba en ps2 cuando estaba chico y el factor nostalgia, aunque sí pueda estar presente, no falsea la experiencia, el juego ha envejecido bien. 

Lo que me podría quejar es que el control de la cámara con mouse es un poco fastidioso, pero con práctica lo puedes ignorar. 

Recomendado

author: {'steamid': '76561198066658100', 'num_games_owned': 205, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 241, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 241, 'last_played': 1707513954}
review:
A la base mon Pixar préféré, mes parents m'ont gentiment offert ce jeu,  jeu que j'ai reçu sur ma PS2. Dans mes souvenirs, j'aimais beaucoup ce jeu. La question que je me suis posé est la suivante: l'est-il toujours aujourd'hui ?

J'étais satisfait de savoir que la version Steam de WALL E est la même que j'avais sur ma PS2. J'allais pouvoir confronter ma perception du JV actuel avec mes souvenirs d'enfant de neuf ans. 

Déja pour un jeu sorti en 2008, le jeu est graphiquement MOCHE. Ce jeu avait déja sept ans de retard lors de sa sortie. Après je ne dis pas, certains textures sont plutôt belles comme celles qui composent WALL E, par exemple, mais sinon ce n'est vraiment pas beau. Le comble, c'est que les cinématiques du jeu (il y en a pas mal au passage) sont encore plus laides que le jeu en lui-même. En effet, c'est de la bonne 240p voir 360p grand maximum pour les cinématiques. Moche, pour un jeu qui est une adaptation d'un film d'animation. Que ce soit les effets de fumée, de lasers ou d'explosions, ils ne sont pas jolis. Il y a même des situations où il n'y avait pas d'effet du tout, comme exploser un gros cube à l'aide d'un autre robot: le robot fait son animation d'attaque et le cube disparait, sans effet et sans bruit.
Pour ce qui est de la direction artistique, il n'y a pas grand chose à dire, car cela reprend strictement l'ésthétique du film. Il n'y a pas eu de volonté de faire plus que ce que le film propose. 

Pour ce qui est de la jouabilité, elle est basique, voir trop simple: un bouton pour sauter, un bouton pour intéragir, un bouton pour transformer WALL E en mode Boîte, ce qui lui permet de glisser ou de passer certains endroits assez exigus. Un bouton pour tirer un laser et enfin un bouton musique, qui permet d'attirer d'autres robots, et qui permettent souvent de débloquer un passage.
Il existe aussi une barre de vitesse: dans certaines zones, il faudra prendre de l'élan afin de sauter sur de grandes distances, et pour cela, il faut utiliser une rembarde de skate ou une grosse pente pour en profiter. Il y a également la mécanique du cube: comme dans le film, WALL E peut fabriquer à partir des tas de détritus qu'il trouve, ça se fait automatiquement quand on passe le personnage sur une pile de déchets, et une fois compacté, WALL E prend le cube, prêt à le lancer sur un interrupteur ou sur un ennemi.
Parlons rapidement des combats: il n'y a qu'un seul type d'ennemis (les Stewards) et ils ne sont pas très palpitant( les combats, hein): en effet, il suffit juste de foncer sur les ennemis en mode Cube pour les éliminer d'un seul coup. 
Il y a beaucoup de phases de jeux différentes: que ce soit de l'exploration avec un peu de plateforme, des sortes de courses, afin d'échapper à une tempête de sable par exemple,des phases où on va jouer E.V.E, ou encore des phases où il faut traverser une route en esquivant les obstacles qui arrive des côtés.
Dans chaque niveau, il y aura des Artéfacts à trouver (Ce sont objets d'un ancien temps par rapport à Wall E (jumelles, parapluie)), ce qui fait qu'il utilise ses objets d'une façon détourné voir comique à l'aide d'une animation en jeu. Mais il y aura aussi des caisses à casser dans les différents niveaux, ces dernières, une fois cassé, nous redonne de l'énergie (santé de WALL E)et de la batterie pour notre laser. A la fin de chaque niveau, on gagne des points et selon si on a cassé toutes les boites et découvert tous les artéfacts du niveau, on gagne plus de points. Ces points permettent de débloquer des codes de triches ou encore des minijeux. Ces derniers peuvent être joué de 2 à 4 joueurs et il s'agit de phases de jeu déjà vu dans le mode solo, comme des courses par exemple.
Pour terminer sur le gameplay, il y a beaucoup de porte à déverouiller. Et pour débloquer ces portes, il y a toujours un mini jeu de mémorisation à faire: ils sont variés mais ralentissent énormément le rythme du jeu, en plus d'être ultra répétitif et très chiant à la longue.

Le jeu reprend l'histoire du film, j'ai rien à dire dessus.

Pareil pour le travail sonore qui reprend celui du film, donc rien à redire.

Il y aussi de l'humour que ce soit dans les découvertes des artéfacts, différentes situations dans l'histoire qui font que, ou encore les game over qui sont assez marrants au début. C'est de l'humour assez enfantin et mignon, mais qui fonctionne sur la plupart des gens.

WALL E est un super film, mais pas un bon jeu. Ce jeu est fait pour un public très jeune, mais de l'époque. Aujourd'hui, il n'en vaut juste pas la peine: techniquement à la ramasse, même pour l'époque, gameplay pas intéressant, histoire connu. WALL E est une relique du passé. Il restera un jeu de mon enfance, mais jamais je le conseillerai aujourd'hui, même pour les fans du film.

author: {'steamid': '76561198993691887', 'num_games_owned': 84, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 274, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 274, 'last_played': 1706218693}
review:
Análise Pessoal ↪ Bom até demais, joguinho nostálgico, bem linear e intuitivo, ta ai um dos jogos que a pixar fez com carinho, recomendo muito!

☆-----Gráficos-----☆
🔲 Feio que dói
🔲 Aceitável
☑️ Bom
🔲 Bonitaço
🔲 Perfeição

review: The positive reviews are almost definitely from nostalgia (but I get it). I thought it would be OK, but how character movement feels really awkward especially during jumps/ramps. Also, like any video game adaptation, they change the story so much it's barely recognisable. I understand that has to happen, but the pacing is bad, and the shifts in tone are nonsensical. If you don't have nostalgia for this game, I wouldn't recommend it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198177914742', 'num_games_owned': 100, 'num_reviews': 55, 'playtime_forever': 239, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 239, 'last_played': 1685327348}
review:
When I was about 10 years old I somehow managed to break one of my Wall-E saves [PSP] on the level where you follow Eve around for the first time, where Eve would have busted animations and sometimes the map triggers wouldn't work. Within this buggy save I had found a way to go out of bounds on the map, thus sparking a passion that I'd carry into my adult years. 
I literally only bought this game just to re-live a childhood dream of breaking my game again. I was able to achieve that this year and get some amazing screenshots of it.
That's a decade-long dream come true.

The port kind of sucks tho rip

author: {'steamid': '76561198233934876', 'num_games_owned': 564, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 259, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 259, 'last_played': 1701320237}
review:
Hoy tuve bastante más tiempo libre y he decidido jugar uno de los juegos de mi infancia, WALL·E!! y fue una experiencia muy bonita, recuerdo que mi play 2 no tenia mucho espacio en la memory card por lo que siempre que jugaba este juego, tenia que empezar de cero. la primera hora de juego me la se de memoria aun con el pasar de los años, y finalmente poder terminarlo al 100% fue algo muy especial, amo los plataformas 3D con todo mi corazón, y este juego es un ejemplo bastante decente de uno simple pero divertido, Wall-e se controla genial y los niveles aunque repetitivos, son entretenidos y están bien pensados, también es una representación bastante fiel de la película, a pesar de tener varias incongruencias y ser notablemente más simple (cosa que era de esperarse)

Siendo ya bastante tarde veo difícil que esto pase, pero me encantaría ver mas juegos de películas licenciadas en steam, como el juego de Ratatouille o el de Bee Movie o el de los simpsons!! uno solo puede soñar.

author: {'steamid': '76561198880342529', 'num_games_owned': 71, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 250, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 247, 'last_played': 1700964718}
review:
Ever since as a kid I remember seeing a YouTube gameplay on this game as a little kid and I wanted to play this so badly but never got the chance. 15 years later I finally played this and it’s a great game.

STORY 

story is kinda the same and stays faithful to the movie except the beginning and instead of walle getting injured in the junk yard EVE did(well that was supposed to be the scene in the movie but they decided to switch it around.

GAMEPLAY

Gameplay is very short (4hrs). You play as WALL·E in some stages and EVE in others (mostly wall-e) .I had fun with the puzzles and the high speed runs. Game was easy to finish.

GRAPHICS

The graphics had NOT aged well it is an old game after all. cutscenes can’t be upscaled unfortunately.

SOUNDTRACK

Soundtrack is ok. For some reason they keep on reusing the same soundtracks so it got repetitive. 

PERFORMANCE 

Despite the game being old it still runs good on modern hardware. I was running 4K max settings and was getting 240-400 fps on game. Ran into no issues 

SUMMARY 

Is the game worth the buy for $20? For that price no. I got a steam key for 5 dollars and in my opinion that is how the game should be priced for being very outdated. Is the game fun? Yes I had a good time with this game and experiencing the nostalgia. My overall rating for this game is 6.9/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198959711111', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 314, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 314, 'last_played': 1696818030}

author: {'steamid': '76561198138395253', 'num_games_owned': 45, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 471, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 437, 'last_played': 1696097008}
review:
7. sınıfa giderken şuan olduğu gibi uzaya çok merakım vardı. Ve bilgisayar ve internetle tanışalı daha bir sene olmuştu. Arkadaşım bana bu oyunun CD'sini hediye etmişti. Oyunu oynadıktan sonra filmini de izlemiştim. Vee üniversite bitti, büyüdüm. Steam'dan oyunu tekrar alıp oynama fırsatım oldu.

Oyun eskiden bana ne hissettirdiyse yine aynı şeyleri hissettirdi. "Sevgi" Sevdiklerimiz için neler yapabileceğimizi tekrardan hissettirdi. 

Ancak bir yandan eski kalp kırıklıklarımı anımsattı bana. Değer verdiğini, sevdiğini söyleyen bazı insanların aslında beni hiç anlamadığını ve gözlerimin içine bakarak bana yalan söyleyip kandırdıklarını. Garip bi nokta şu ki bu insanlardan birisine wall-e filmini önermiştim. O da bana staj yaptığı yerde kendisine önerilen filmlerin listesini atmıştı. Hayat insanı öyle noktaya getiriyor ki. Bi animasyon karakteri olan WALL-e'nin hikayesinden etkilenebiliyorsunuz. Oyun bir yandan kalbimi pufuduk hale getirirken bir yandan yaşadıklarımı anımsatıp ağlatıyor. 

Ha birde bunlar haricinde çevreyi kirletmemek gerektiğini de öğretiyor.

author: {'steamid': '76561198035697752', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 171, 'playtime_forever': 857, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 857, 'last_played': 1609629302}
review:
Wall-E é a minha animação favorita e é claro que eu não poderia deixar de ter o joguinho.

Após vários e vários anos de capitalismo e consumismo desembestado, pasmem, os humanos conseguiram coroar o planetinha terra como o maior lixão do sistema planetário.
A solução? Criar um batalhão de robôs programados para limpar tudo, enquanto os humanos saem fugidos para dar uma voltinha pelo universo; mas algo dá muito errado e a missão deixar a terra como um brinco foi pelo espaço.

O jogador assume o papel do único robozinho que restou na terra, e que ainda realiza o trabalho de limpeza metodicamente. Tudo estava normalmente normal na rotina regrada de Wall-E até que outra robozinha, a EVE, é enviada à terra para obter informações e descobrir se o mundo pode ser habitado novamente pelos humanos.
(O planeta continua aquela zona rural e urbana, com certeza se EVE tivesse avisado que estaria chegando, Wall-E poderia ter acelerado a limpeza e quem sabe ter deixado a terra pelo menos 0,0005 mais limpa, mas EVE chegou de supetão).

Wall-E fica encantado por EVE já que é o primeiro serzinho que ele vê depois de muito muito tempo além da sua fiel amiga dona baratinha, e é a partir daí que a aventura começa.

* Clássico do PS2.
* O jogo possui a mesma história da animação com alguns extras.
* Os gráficos são de um jogo de 2008, então para mim estão ótimos.
* Possui pequenos puzzles no decorrer da história.
* Eventualmente é possível jogar com a EVE.
* O jogo apresenta alguns bugs, existem também alguns buracos e falhas,  e se sua agilidade estiver meio zoada, assim como a minha, tu cairá como eu cai =X.
* É possível finalizar em 5 horas ou menos.

Obs: Essa é uma obra de ficção e qualquer semelhança com a realidade é mera coincidência.

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2023856107

review:
Toujours aussi bon que dans mes souvenirs d'enfance ! Walle reste l'un des meilleurs jeux pixar. 
Un choix que je ne comprend pas c'est que nous avons uniquement la version psp, ps2 alors que la version ps3, Wii et xbox 360 était largement au dessus et les pc a l'époque le fessait tournée. 
Surement une histoire de droit...
Nous avons donc le gameplay de la version ps2,PSP évidement en ultra qualité et c'est un pure bonheur nostalgique.

review: Одна з улюблених ігор дитинства. Був приємно вражений, що вона і після перепроходження у дорослому віці все ще справляє хороше враження. Сюжет практично повністю взятий із мультфільму із невеликими змінами певних епізодів. Геймплей хороший: він простий, не перевантажений зайвими механіками і тому легкий в освоєнні. Зайде як і дитині, так і дорослому не буде нудно. Пробігається швидко, за що окремий плюс. Рекомендую. 5 із 10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198195964729', 'num_games_owned': 51, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 298, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 298, 'last_played': 1688151612}
review:
WALL-E é bem mais complicado do que eu imaginava. Mesmo sendo de criança, tem puzzles que você precisa prestar um pouco de atenção para faze-ló. 

Sobre a história, você consegue zerar ele em umas 2h/3h de gameplay, e ainda tem o epilogo e depois os mini-games, podendo jogar sozinho ou em grupo de até 4 pessoas. 

Os colecionáveis, são muito engraçados. São itens aleatórios do dia a dia, que o WALL-E descobre e interage de maneira super fofa e engraçada. Vale muito a pena ficar de olho neles durantes as missões. 

O combate é divertido e fácil de entender, mas não se engane que é ridículo. Tem certos inimigos, que jogam objetos que te matam em um único dano. Já pro final, tem uma fase que mais complicada de se derrotar os inimigos mas nada impossível.

No geral, WALL-E é um jogo leve que entretêm principalmente aqueles que gostam da história e dos personagens do filme, além de preencher algumas pontas soltas deixadas na trama original do filme.

author: {'steamid': '76561198093545625', 'num_games_owned': 3014, 'num_reviews': 1146, 'playtime_forever': 340, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 340, 'last_played': 1687444058}
review:
ВАЛЛ-И — это игра в жанрах экшены(за ЕВУ, и местами за ВАЛЛ-И), платформеры(за ВАЛЛ-И), аркада по мотивам одноименного анимационного фильма от студии Pixar, повествующего о приключениях последнего робота на планете Земля, который решил совершить путешествие по вселенной. 

После пересмотра одноименного мультика, все таки решился поиграть, видел по футажам что не совсем мой проект, даже на тот момент, когда узнал только о нем, но собрался, и началось! Первые уровни еще кое как со скрипом я проходил и собирал ящики, в принципе если бы не уровни на время, я бы все собрал, и не так бухтел, но блин я перезапускал 2 уровень наверно раз 20 просто чтоб собрать все ящики, там трудность была в одном месте, но я собрал, думал ладно щас разминка. Еще один момент мне очень подрывал пукан, это когда ты собираешь 69 ящиков из 70, и тебе говорят мол ты лох, и очков не дают, а если ты запускаешь уровень, собирай 70 ящиков еще раз, нам твое время не жалко, а тебе? Вообщем то я послал эти ящики куда подальше, было тяжело, душа перфекциониста выла, но мне было все равно.

Левел на земле, очень серый, хотелось бы быстрее на белую чистую Аксиому)
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2991748124

Так же в игре есть загадки, типа на память, и вообщем то все, кое какой тип загадок немного в конце где надо было запомнить 5 цветов в нужной последовательности, без записывания, немного напрягал, но с 2-3 попытки падал, а так для детей)  Музыка тут конечно на любителя из 1930, и кстати бывает поднадоедает.

Отдельное не спасибо, кто делал порт, вроде мышка есть, но где нужно, в сегменте с лазером у ВАЛЛ-И и плазмой у ЕВЫ извольте целится клавой, я конечно справился, но блин мышка тут бесполезна. И кстати русского в игре нет, пришлось ставить отдельно.

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2994515661

Всего в игре на 4 часа, если не собирать ящики или в моем случает 50 на 50 6 часов, половину собрал) 27 уровней, из них 2 не обязательных - испытания, которые я попробовал, там опять на время, я просто еще попробовал раза 3, ну не дается ну и пошли они) И кстати говоря собирать все ящики действительно просто не зачем, они конвертируются в очки которые потом тратим чтоб открыть плюшки, картинки) и мне хватило)

Вообщем-то если бы не последние уровни я бы поставил игре удовлетворительно, а так натянул на хорошо)

review: I have been playing this game since 2011 on my ps2. I recently bought it on Steam because our television does not support old ps2 output and input connections. Nostalgia kicks in by the moment you start playing and listening to the old music of the game. Such a great adventure game for all ages. I recommend it to all the people who want to experience the world of WALL-E and bond with the character's thoughts. Worth every penny!

review:
either very fun or very frustrating. there is no in between.

i bought this game remembering how much i loved playing the game on the Xbox 360 back then. turns out, this and the Wii version are nothing like the 360/PS3 version. i can't even theorize about what happened, they're two entirely different games, and this is the worse one by far. i was either very fond of the action taking place, or very frustrated with the bugs and lack of sense i could make of it.

just play the 360 or PS3 version through emulation instead. much better experience than this.

author: {'steamid': '76561198100649521', 'num_games_owned': 312, 'num_reviews': 43, 'playtime_forever': 93, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 44, 'last_played': 1690525693}
review:
An absolute masterclass of fiction. The story elements are gorgeous, who could've expected such an emotionally driven story to appear in such a game. The part where Wall-E confronted Eve about the severity of her actions was such an intense moment. Truly a thought provoking piece of media that is unmatched by any modern game.

On top of that, the gameplay is like if you took dark souls and combined it with undertale. It feels so smooth to play, truly an incredible experience from beginning to end.

author: {'steamid': '76561198216635932', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 559, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 559, 'last_played': 1679474905}
review:
Les graphismes ont indéniablement vieilli, mais le gameplay, sûrement pas !

Je conseil ce jeu à ceux qui veulent offrir un bon jeu à des enfants ou encore à des fans de l'univers de Wall-E/Pixar (il y a quelques clins d'oeil aux autres oeuvres Pixar dans ce jeu).

A peu près une dizaine d'heures de jeu pour terminer l'histoire (défis et objectifs secondaires inclus) 
Mode multijoueur local disponible, compatibilité manette (et d'ailleurs, je conseil de jouer à la manette et non avec la config. Clavier/Souris.). Il se peut qu'il y ait un bug la première fois que vous essayez de jouer avec la manette. Paniquez pas, redémarrez juste le jeu.

author: {'steamid': '76561198141961932', 'num_games_owned': 126, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 480, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 406, 'last_played': 1703297972}
review:
Been playing the PS2 and PSP versions of this game for several years, always thought it was above average quality for a kids game.

So when my friend gifted me the pc version for my birthday, I decided to 100% it  before writing a review. So i did.

Honestly, it holds up pretty well as a game for its age. Sure, it's not an amazing blockbuster title, but for a licenses kids game, many of which where horrible back in the day, it's pretty solid. Never really too difficult, fun levels, Wall-e himself controls very well, etc. Decently designed game over all. Also very easy to run in 2023, so you can easily max out the graphic settings for maximum details on modern pcs without dropping that many frames

Also, unlike the Wii, PS3 and Xbox 360 versions of the game, this is actually a better game to play. Those versions felt way more frustrating then this one

End of the day, if you want a short little game thats reasonable fun, give this a try. Also give this a try if you've only played the Wii/PS3/Xbox 360 versions. This is far better then that.

Justt set decent expectations before going in. It is a low budget kids game from 2008, after all

author: {'steamid': '76561198334822561', 'num_games_owned': 156, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 167, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 124, 'last_played': 1678059889}
review:
Good to know that I still suck at this game just as much as I did when I was a kid.

This is simply a port of the original PS2 (or Xbox) game. I had no idea it existed on Steam until today and picked it up immediately. IIRC, this game came out a bit before movies and whatnot were being used to mass-produce shovelware trash so this is fortunate, as it's a really well done game. If you like the movie and/or are here for nostalgia purposes, definitely pick this up.

author: {'steamid': '76561198402360538', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 545, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 422, 'last_played': 1683732627}
review: Jogo muito divertido, gráficos ainda muito bons para a época em que foi lançado, é apropriado para qualquer idade e segue fielmente a história do filme com bastantes cutscenes e cenas carismáticas do personagem. Este jogo é tão incrível e nostálgico que tem potencial para reerguer o carinho pelo personagem "Wall-E" e ser construido outro jogo totalmente melhorado com mecânicas novas e uma jogabilidade totalmente aprimorada no que diz respeito às tecnologias atuais, seja para playstation, Xbox, pc, ou qualquer outra plataforma da atualidade.

author: {'steamid': '76561199072494966', 'num_games_owned': 203, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 522, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 522, 'last_played': 1677715059}
review: Nostalgia <3

author: {'steamid': '76561198139710309', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 340, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 340, 'last_played': 1677685907}
review: Wall-E was one of my childhood games. I will never forget; I used to be soo bad at this game back when I was a child, which made me play this game for hours and hours, which in the end, lasted for days to finish. Now that I saw it on steam, I wanted to try again, and the feeling of nostalgia... It was amazing.

author: {'steamid': '76561198085577118', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 137, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 137, 'last_played': 1677085224}
review:
I purchased this game with the intention of playing it with my 3+ years' old son. Upon purchase, I played by myself the first 15 minutes, which serve are an introduction to the controls and the game-play, via a series of tests. Then, I played what looked like the first level.

I gave up and requested a refund because I did not like the handling/control of the character (Wall-E) and the need to constantly (and manually) move the camera, in order to get things done in a rather small space.

If this game is meant for younger ages, both character and camera controls should have been much simpler. For everyone else, the game-play is very linear and boring.

In terms of how it looks, the game uses very low resolution bitmaps which means that, even when launched in 4K resolution, it still looks very low res. Asobo Studio could have easily updated it with higher resolution bitmaps, as they're still selling it on Steam.

Overall, this game gave me the impression of a very low-cost production, a game that could have been pulled off by a team of 2-3 people max within 2-3 months worth of effort. I expected more but, then, most games derived from a movie fall short of gamers' expectations, as the publishers' objective is to monetize the movie's reputation and recover the cost of licensing, which works against investing into the quality of the product.

I do not recommend it.

review: The worldbuilding and atmosphere is unironically on par with games such as Half Life 2. The creepy industrially broken setting and graphics combined with the banger soundtrack and fluid platforming make this game go from a typical licensed piece of trash to an actually great experience. Only real complaint is the same with most 3D Sonic games, where the ground control can be clunky when not zooming through at high speeds. 8.5/10 loved it during my childhood, loved it even more as an adult.

author: {'steamid': '76561198931133297', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 358, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 69, 'last_played': 1711188768}
review:
Gra komputerowa "WALL-E" stworzona przez Disney Interactive Studios to wspaniała produkcja, która pozwala graczom wejść w świat uwielbianego przez dzieci i dorosłych robota WALL-E.

Jest to gra akcji z elementami platformówki, w której gracz kieruje robotem, który ma za zadanie oczyszczać ziemskie ruiny i zbierać przedmioty. Gra opiera się na fabule filmu "WALL-E" i umożliwia graczom przeżycie niezapomnianych chwil z postaciami znanymi z filmu.

Jednym z największych atutów gry jest jej piękna, kolorowa grafika, która oddaje doskonale klimat filmu. Świat przedstawiony w grze jest bardzo rozbudowany i daje wiele możliwości do eksploracji. Gracz musi pokonać wiele przeszkód, jak chociażby zbieranie śmieci, a także walczyć z różnymi przeciwnikami, co daje grze dużą dawkę emocji i adrenaliny.

Muzyka w grze jest również świetna i doskonale oddaje klimat filmu. Gracz może usłyszeć utwory, które były grane w filmie, co pozwala na jeszcze głębsze zanurzenie się w świat "WALL-E".

Jedyną wadą gry może być jej krótka długość. Przyjemność z gry można odnieść w ciągu kilku godzin, co może zniechęcić niektórych graczy.

Podsumowując, gra komputerowa "WALL-E" to doskonała propozycja dla fanów filmu, jak i dla miłośników gier akcji. Świetna grafika i dźwięk, w połączeniu z ciekawą fabułą, dają graczom niezapomniane wrażenia. Jednakże, gra mogłaby być nieco dłuższa.

author: {'steamid': '76561198148389144', 'num_games_owned': 467, 'num_reviews': 90, 'playtime_forever': 779, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 779, 'last_played': 1675862871}
review:
[h1] Прыжок в детство [/h1]

Тёплая, милая, ностальгическая и классная игра попала в библиотеку стим спустя больше десятка лет. Я быстро взялся за её прохождение, ведь воспоминания крутились в голове, а руки чесались от желания поиграть. Игра спокойно запустилась на современной операционке, пускай и без русификатора. 

Камера в играх от третьего лица штука страшная, эта игра не исключение. Как не крути мышкой, камера всё равно будет смотреть туда, куда она захочет. Местами хитбоксы странные, я не понял как получить 100% в этой игре (максимум лишь до 94% довёл). Это всё абсолютное ничто, ведь сюжет и персонажи в этой игре, в этом мультфильме просто нечто. Музыка, а особенно в локации со свалкой - невероятная и атмосферная. Мыльная графика зайдёт не каждому, но хотя бы мульт нужно посмотреть. УльтраМегаЛайк.

author: {'steamid': '76561199448825967', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1596, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 50, 'last_played': 1690403359}
review: This game is so much fun! It takes me back to the days when I speedran WALL•E on the Wii, but I think this PC version is better. The abilities of WALL•E in this game are more accurate to the movie than the Wii version, but the Wii story is more accurate to the movie. The cheats are so much fun! But the one thing I miss about the Wii version that the PC doesn't have is the ability to play WALL•E and EVE together. Other than that, perfect game! Totally worth 20 bucks! A great adaptation of the best movie ever!

review: An Incredible adventure for a spin off game. Wall-E was definitely a childhood favourite of mine and some relatives also. The game itself although isn't usually the type of game I'd go for, the uniqueness and different play styles you'd have to try in order to pass levels is tuned greatly. I personally enjoyed the game and do recommend this game for old time sake.

author: {'steamid': '76561198266762214', 'num_games_owned': 484, 'num_reviews': 134, 'playtime_forever': 213, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 213, 'last_played': 1670683336}
review: Хорошая, добрая игра, с какими-то прикольными геймплейными решениями, головоломки достаточно простые, ну совсем для детей, именно которые в терминалах, а вот сами уровни порой заставят сломить голову, так что средне-мозгонапрягательно из 10, в целом игра действительно на основе мультфильма, но она имеет достаточно скудное изображение сюжета, развитие отношение между Валли и Евой, тут просто просраны, и убиты, столько важных моментов вырезано и исковеркано, они практически сразу же после знакомства любят безумно друг-друга, хотя когда в мультфильме самом они к этому приходят на протяжении всего мультфильма, как он показывал ей свою коллекцию вещей или хотя бы тот же самый фильм из-за которого он искал тоже своего рода любовь, ну зато надо вставить порой лишние моменты, которые просто душат и выматывают, я бы на вашем месте не играл бы в это, ни до, ни после мультфильма.

author: {'steamid': '76561198877601180', 'num_games_owned': 369, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 394, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 394, 'last_played': 1669439527}
review:
first, i want to say the game is incredibly overpriced  
its a very old game, with old graphics and (very) janky controls

i think the game is lots of fun!
i used to be a huge fan as a kid, and when i found it on steam as an adult i had to play
it mostly lived up to my nostalgia - it was fun, i got to relive the story, and at no point it seemed too easy despite being a kids game, nor too difficult, it was just perfect!

some of the levels are significantly better than others, controls map VERY badly on the keyboard with no way to customize without external software

review: Wall-e is fun to control. I love the way he swerves around the well-built levels even if his jumping never feels quite right. I was surprised to find that it hit all the major story beats of the movie and does it justice. In other words, exactly what a movie tie-in game should.

review: Ótimo jogo, para passar o tempo, não e difícil só jogando para passar, fica até bem rápido, mas se for pegar todos os itens escondidos e caixas, demora um pouco mais e é até mais interessante se tenar pegar eles, as dancinhas e animações que ele faz são muito engraçadinhas, e no menu tem como desbloquear itens para o jogar, tem mini games para depois do jogo, alguns itens só tem como desbloquear com códigos que você acha facilmente na intente mas cidade para não usar um que deixa o jogo sem graça, eu recomendo, ainda mais se tiver em promoção, hahahahah

review: Meu Deus, é um presente do universo, isso tá dublado, é um dos jogos que mais joguei na época do PS2, eu simplesmente amo esse jogo, amo os personagens, o universo, a jogabilidade, eu amo tudo nesse jogo, todo mundo deveria jogar, merecia um remake. compre em promoção, Abaixo de 15 reais vale muito a pena.

author: {'steamid': '76561199098088708', 'num_games_owned': 60, 'num_reviews': 54, 'playtime_forever': 2762, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 11, 'playtime_at_review': 1180, 'last_played': 1711721508}
review: To be honest: I still think this version is still the best version of this game. The versions for DS, playstation and so on weren't bad but this version of the game has the best level design of all. The animations of the humans may be horrifying and they still haunt me in my dreams but the bots look cool. The level designs look awesome and they're neither too hard, nor too easy. Not to mention the epic soundtracks they used for this game. It was worth buying it to feel the nostalgia this game holds for those who grew up with this franchise!

author: {'steamid': '76561198259849166', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 221, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 207, 'last_played': 1663569980}
review:
Una increible aventura de Wall-e para pasar el tiempo por nostalgia debido a que tenias el juego antes en la playstation pero no un remaster, el mismo simple juego que quieres recordar o tuviste la curiosidad de compralo. Bien recomendado porque sigue la misma idea de la pelicula pero cambia ciertas partes ademas de conocer un poquito mas a Wall-e con las piezas que coleccionas y un epilogo.
Los controles son algo complicados al comienzo y la camara con el mouse no es tan eficiente causando a que no lo uses muy seguido.
Lo volveria a jugar si no fuera por la camara la verdad. 

I would say this is an incredible adventure if you are feeling nostalgic about the game and its really worth it, its not a remaster, of course but it gives you a chance to play again with your little friend Wall-e from the playstation version from the game. Its good to remember the parts from the movies and seeing the little changes that will lead us to same results (Not saying spoilers, find out yourself) 
From my pov, the controllers are really tough at the start but you get the hang of it after a while but the camera sensitivity was one of my main fights in game, was better to slowly move Wall-e to the required direction to be more efficient. 
I wish i could play it again if it wasnt for the camera issues but i could go back if im feeling nostalgic about it.

author: {'steamid': '76561199015422210', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 790, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 779, 'last_played': 1709419427}
review:
Ah, dulce infancia; qué nostalgia. En mi casa nos encantaba jugar a este juego y sigue siendo igual de entretenido y adorable como lo recordaba <3. Por supuesto ya no me resulta tan difícil como antes y en unas horas es posible resolverlo, pero no quita que me parezca súper recomendable.
Tiene unos cuántos jueguitos para jugar de a dos, y sobre todo el de las carreras y el de la recogida de plantas son muy buenos! Podés tirarle láser a tu oponente o golpearle para sacarle ventaja jajajaj me encanta xD
Algo que siempre me llamó la atención es que cambia en varios puntos la historia de la película; no son detalles que molesten realmente, pero es notable.
WALL-E es de mis películas favoritas de la infancia y este juego le hace justicia, capturando la ternura y la esencia de la misma. No será muy largo pero para lo poco que sale (sobre todo si lo agarrás de oferta) lo vale completamente!

author: {'steamid': '76561199060600802', 'num_games_owned': 153, 'num_reviews': 92, 'playtime_forever': 434, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 367, 'last_played': 1689222715}
review:
Wall E for PC feels so surreal...

Something about exploring a trashed earth and parts of the Axiom have a sense of magic to them. And seeing certain scenes drastically shorten to not be as impactful or given thought. Or even that Garbage Rescue scene being based off the deleted scenes.

It's a fun little platformer with puzzles that are easy to deal with.its just surreal going through this game as an alternative universe where Wall E was not the Wall E we know. He's Sonic the Hedgehog in this game.

No kidding, Wall E for PC is one of the more surreal games (based off a movie) that I played. Good little distraction otherwise. Not a bad movie game.

author: {'steamid': '76561199028316330', 'num_games_owned': 33, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 285, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 267, 'last_played': 1677236735}
review:
Un juego muy infravalorado, aparte de que Wall-e es mi película favorita de Pixar, su juego es también muy bueno (quizás no tanto como la peli pero igual es bueno) Si es verdad que algunas cosas no envejecieron bien como algunos modelos de personaje que parecen de Psp, los controles con Eva que son horribles y las cinemáticas prerenderizadas que se ven del asco incluso en resoluciones altas. Pero ignorando eso el juego es muy entretenido, los controles de Wall-e responden bien y sus habilidades son muy curiosas como lanzar rallos láser, hacer lo que yo llamo un "turbo-caja xd", además de que el soundtrack (en especial el de los primeros niveles de tierra) son hermosos y se parecen mucho a los de la pélicula, además de que si eres streamer y te preocupa que te metan coppyright o cosas asi pues no te preocupes porque todas son libres de derechos de autor. En conclusión un muy buen juego bastante infravalorado solo por ser un juego basado en una película para niños 8/10.
P.D: recomiendo jugar las versiones de Ps2 Y PC ya que la de Psp tiene muy mal apartado gráfico además de que recorta contenido, la de Wii/Ps3/Xbox360 apesar de que es mejor en gráficos, es muy sosa y recorta algunos soundtracks aunque añade unos nuevos, y la de DS no tiene nada que ver con todas estas versiones y solo la recomiendo a los que les gustan los juegos de puzles.

author: {'steamid': '76561198076820255', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 327, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 327, 'last_played': 1651708427}
review:
I'll never forget the day I first played this game. It was after I had seen WALL-E in theatres and fell in love with it. Our family had a PS2 at home for one purpose - Singstar Party. That changed that afternoon after walking home from the theatre when I asked my parents to get me the game after seeing it in HMV. 

I played the game over and over again. I didn't have a memory card, so I could never save my progress. But that didn't matter to me. I loved this game. It perfectly captured everything I loved about the movie - the gritty, atmospheric earth; the bustling melancholy of the Axiom spaceship; the brilliant characters, scenario & message.

It speaks volumes about the state of the industry that for a movie license game to be competent is a very welcome surprise. This version of WALL•E - released on PS2, PSP, PC & Mac isn't just a competent game, it's a brilliant one. Excellent puzzle-platforming gameplay making perfect use of the setpieces shown in the film. Solid, hillarious cutscenes that keep you up with the plot. Fun side modes, mini-games and alternate sequences that break up the gameplay. Any shortcomings in lack of polish - and let's be clear, this is a flawed game in many areas - are more than made up for by its creativity. It's well rounded, fun & clever - qualities which even in 2022 you don't see very often.

Over a decade on, I wonder if any Heavy Iron Studios / Asobo Games employees - now the makers of nothing less than the world-renoun Microsoft Flight Simulator - still read these reviews. If they do, hear this: Thank you so, so much for bothering when you didn't need to. Your passion for this world and this game to create a quality product was not fruitless in the end. Playing this game again was a dose of nostalgia, and a reminder to appreciate the forgotten people who make games like this thanklessly.

author: {'steamid': '76561198302803735', 'num_games_owned': 115, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 1147, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 618, 'last_played': 1710541335}
review:
This game was genuinely part of my childhood. My dad got me the DVD-based one when I was maybe only 4 or so, and I played it to death. Like literally. I killed the disc. Luckily enough, my dad is a smart man, and bought 3, seeing as 4-year olds and DVD's don't particularly mix well. I actually still have the OG DVD to this day, and as long as you have a good enough DVD-drive in your PC, then it actually still runs fine. I've also got the second one on the shelf next to me, not in much better of condition, as I was still young, but it works fine in the vast majority of DVD-drives. The third one is actually packed away in a storage box, out in my garage, never opened. Still sealed and all. I almost opened it a couple of years ago, but decided against it, as it's a genuine part of my childhood, and I wanted to preserve it. There were always some issues that I had with it ever since the day that I got it. 2 to be precise. 1: It was a DVD; Fragile and easily scratched. Even at the age of 4 I knew that they were incredibly weak and frail. 2: You, *had*, to have the disc in to play the stinkin' game. No arguing. I never understood why as a young child, all that I knew was that it was Very, very, *VERY*, annoying. Then, a couple of years ago, all of my problems were instantly solved. The game was on steam. I had wanted to get it for awhile up until this point, but I figured that seeing as I already had the game on DVD, it wouldn't really do me much good to purchase it digitally. Oooooh boy was I wrong. I just recently purchased it a couple days ago for the full $20 asking price, even though it was gonna be going for $4 in just a few days, and I do not regret it. Not only do I think that the game is worth the full-fledged $20, (whether that be more from bias or not, I do not know :P), the convenience of having it digitally is just spectacular. It's so much easier to just download it really quick, NOT have to put in the disk, and to just play it. Digressing, I stand by the fact that it's still a really fun, super great game, even at 16 years old where I should probably start to like guns or something like that. Buy it if you don't have it. Play it to death if you haven't already.

Sorry for the English essay, but thank you for listening to my Ted Talk,
Good night.

-Grey man :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198016169395', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 293, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 47, 'last_played': 1646436452}
review:
Я скажу то, что для тебя не новость: мир не такой уж солнечный и приветливый. Это очень опасное, жесткое место, и если только дашь слабину, он опрокинет с такой силой тебя, что больше уже не встанешь. Ни ты, ни я, никто на свете, не бьёт так сильно, как жизнь! Совсем не важно, как ты ударишь, а важно, какой держишь удар, как двигаешься вперёд. Будешь идти — ИДИ! Если с испугу не свернёшь... Только так побеждают!
Если знаешь, чего ты стоишь — иди и бери своё! Но будь готов удары держать, а не плакаться и говорить: «Я ничего не добился из-за него, из-за неё, из-за кого-то!» Так делают трусы! А ты не трус! Быть этого не может!

author: {'steamid': '76561198211724679', 'num_games_owned': 140, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 330, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 261, 'last_played': 1708541655}
review:
Um clássico do PS2!

[Analise]
Recomendo fortemente a quem jogou jogar novamente,
ele possui uma novidade comparada a sua versão de PS2 o jogo é totalmente dublado/legendado por mais que o jogo não tenha tantas falas isso pra sua época 2008 é algo incrível, eu só tinha jogado em espanhol no PS2!

Porém apenas recomendo comprar em promoção, o jogo não é longo podendo ser zerado em 3 a 4 horas de gameplay e se for buscar 100% pode adicionar umas 2 horinhas a mais, isso se você já não conseguir pegar todas as caixas e artefatos logo na primeira jogada o que não é difícil.

[Controles]
O jogo ele tem total suporte a teclado e mouse porém se você for jogar recomendo usar o controle não há nada que vá te atrapalhar ou travar em fase, eu falo isso por que
tive dificuldades nas fases contra tempo pegar as caixas no meio do caminho é difícil no teclado e mouse fora que se for colocar alguma criança pra jogar ela vai se adaptar e ter bom rendimento no controle.

[Bugs]
Eu tive 2 bugs ao longo da minha gameplay

Primeiro deles foi na fase do estaleiro quando temos que acertar a hélice de um navio com cubo de lixo quando pulamos na hélice o Wall-e meio que se você fica parado a hélice vai e você cai no precipício tipo as plataformas do jogo mineirinho, sendo necessário de movimentar um pouco para não cair.

Segundo bug e eu acho que o mais grave, na axiom alguns comissários ficavam invisíveis e alguns até ficavam flutuando no meio do mapa o que atrapalhava muito, eles sumiam e do nada brotavam já te dando choque inclusive até gravei um vídeo abaixo mostrando esse bug.

https://youtu.be/vsCOzj_5a38

[Considerações finais]
Um dos melhores jogos já feitos na época de Ouro da THQ juntamente com UP altas aventuras, Os incríveis 1 e 2 e Ratatouille que infelizmente nenhum deles está disponível para compra mas quem jogou sabe o carinho e o amor que era pegar uma tarde ligar o seu vídeo game e passar horas e horas jogando essas lindas obras.

author: {'steamid': '76561198122714605', 'num_games_owned': 216, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 446, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 183, 'last_played': 1659481270}
review: Wall-E es un juego de plataformas y aventuras que recrea la película. Normalmente los juegos que se basan en películas no son muy buenos, pero el videojuego de Wall-E es de las mejores adaptaciones de videojuegos que existen. Tienen una gran cantidad de niveles con muchos coleccionables, galerías de imagenes desbloqueables, una jugabilidad simple pero cómoda y con mucha variedad de niveles y situaciones, unos gráficos bastante decentes y una buena banda sonora. Si te gustó mucho la película y te gustan los juegos de aventura/plataforma lo recomiendo bastante. No es el mejor juego de plataformas que existe, pero aún así es muy competente y bastante divertido.

author: {'steamid': '76561199069759215', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 3350, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 21, 'playtime_at_review': 2730, 'last_played': 1711313817}
review: Pierwsza gra w jaką w ogóle zagrałem. Mam wiele pozytywnych wspomnień z tą produkcją, film Walle jest do dziś jednym z moich ulubionych filmów. Gra jest na nim mocno oparta, choć nie jest jego wierną kopią, a raczej miksem oryginalnej fabuły i wyciętych/usuniętych scen. Do tego mamy też możliwość grania 2-4 graczy na jednym ekranie w kilka minigier. Choć gra nie jest idealna (znajdzie się parę bugów, ale raczej mało szkodliwych), Walle ma szczególne miejsce w mojej pamięci :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198382528442', 'num_games_owned': 61, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 1321, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 1, 'playtime_at_review': 17, 'last_played': 1711839529}
review:
I previously played this on my PS2 back in 2010 (Age 5) and it was one of the first games I ever played! I have some very good memories from this game, I even invited some friends over to my house to play this game in the Minigames mode! This is in my opinion the best Movie Tie-In game ever and it holds a very special place in my heart. I actually just bought it an hour ago on steam to play it again and I would give this game a 8.8/10 mainly because of the fun times I had with it when I was younger.

Cheers,
Lúkas Örn

review:
В свое время упустила эту игру.
И очень даже зря) 
Прекрасное 3д приключение отчасти следующее сюжету оригинального фильма.
Графика даже сейчас выглядит вполне неплохо, еще бы отреставрировать сюжетные ролики )
Простые и понятные механики, отзывчивое управление. Слегка однообразная музыка но в целом терпимо)
Спасибо тебе Валли ты вернул мне мой 2008 :)

review: Hayal kırıklığına uğradım...  zamanında xbox360 da oynamıştım. Hâla tüm bölümlerini dün gibi hatırlarım. Ama ne yazıkki bu port ps2 versiyonunun portu. Aynı isim, aynı müzikler. Aynı karakter kontrol şemasına vs sahip olsada xbox360/ps3 versiyonu ile aralarında dağlar var. Boss fightlar, bağzı oynanış mekanikleri. Hepsi eksik. Eğer sizde benim gibi xbox360 veya ps3 ten oynadıysanız aynı zevki alamıyacaksınız çünkü bu çok basit bi film oyunu. Diğer verdiyon ise bayağı iyi. review:
[h1]If you watched (and liked) the movie, you should definitely buy this![/h1]
[hr][/hr]
It is a kind of long game which means more fun!
To get access to stuff you first have to do a simple puzzle.
The puzzle is easy and a kid can do it easily
The game also does have [u]checkpoints[/u] (but they don't tell you if you got it)
[b]Overall, it's a fun game and you should buy it!

[b][i]Also, why does this game have the Hentai tag?!?![/i][/b]

author: {'steamid': '76561198077153956', 'num_games_owned': 4302, 'num_reviews': 481, 'playtime_forever': 405, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 405, 'last_played': 1636880455}
review: Наверное мультфильм про милого робота ВАЛЛ-И для меня самый любимый во всей пиксаровской линейки. Сюжет прекрасная сатира на образ жизни людей и их отношение к собственной планете. Правда экологическая катастрофа как мне кажется произойдёт гораздо раньше, а разумных роботов мы так и не научились создавать. Что касается игры, она скорее разочаровывает. Французы из Asobo Studio придумали целую кучу всяких фишек - магнитные кубы, управляемые валли другие добрые роботы. Но всё это пригодится от силы пару раз, оставшееся время мы просто двигаемся по крошечным локациям и бросаемся разными кубиками. К сожалению разработчики не поняли, что исследовательская часть самая лучшая. Поиск артефактов и их применение роботом единственное что вызывает хоть какие то эмоции. А они сконцентрировались исключительно на романтической линии. Причём это приводит к глупым условностям, ведь ЕВА вполне могла перенести своего партнёра через кучу ловушек. Да ещё и графика для 2008 уже была очень плоха. Вообщем WALL-E получился не очень особенно на фоне мультфильма. 6.0

author: {'steamid': '76561198851468272', 'num_games_owned': 229, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 302, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 302, 'last_played': 1631486692}
review: Купил ключ за сотку, окунулся в детство. Когда я в нее играл, это была не самая новейшая игра, но она очень четко запомнилась в моей голове, некоторые миссии я помню до сей поры, но вспомнил о игре только сейчас. Игры от фильмов Дисней тогда делали качественные и интересные, они могли уместить детские головоломки, формат, управление. Но даже для более взрослых пользователей они придумали две фичи. Ты должен разбить все коробки, которые встречались в миссии, найти сувениры. Да немного, но они пытались. Круто что после прохождения, есть пару мини-миссии чтобы в последний раз посмотреть на игру и удалить её

author: {'steamid': '76561198268478031', 'num_games_owned': 152, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 16, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 15, 'last_played': 1642317317}
review: Picture this. its 2009, you're 7 years old and you're waiting in the apple store while your mom buys a new phone. You find the childrens table with 4 Macs placed about and those ball chairs that are basically the target ball. your mom sits you down and you start to play Disney Pixars WALL-E adventure game. suddenly you gain consciousness and this is the first thing you remember, it pops into memory every now and then as nothing more than a damn bro those were the days. smash cut to 2021 and you're discord watch partying Wall-E and you wonder " i wonder if that game still exists" only to find that it does and its 20$ so you buy a copy and play for about 15 minutes realize that this is the game that peaked humanity and then write a review to share in your nostalgia.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970729447', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 130, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 130, 'last_played': 1628372817}
review: I'm usually easy to please and while the game play for this is a little bit novel, the graphics are weak, the story is lame, and the UI is atrociously designed. Bought this for my daughter and I to play together and without committing to hours of of single player, you get one little multiplayer level that is a split-screen racing game. A bit novel, great music, poorly executed game.

review: Obra de arte a pesar de ser un juego basado en una película, se supone cuales juegos son de esa índole no suelen ser muy buenos, pero esta es una excepción igual de bueno que la película, jugabilidad entretenida, lo bueno que respeta la película tal cual excepto la escena en la que Wall-e es herido por Auto (se conserva la escena cancelada) y debe reparar a Eva, juego de mi infancia el cual no a envejecido mal del todo, estamos ante el port de PS2/PSP con alguna que otra mejora mínima, recomendado totalmente para los fans de Wall-E

author: {'steamid': '76561198057316369', 'num_games_owned': 455, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 508, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 508, 'last_played': 1629413734}
review: It's a good enough game, don't expect revolutionary gameplay, but it's nice to play around. The puzzles get boring pretty quickly, but they are easy enough to ignore them. author: {'steamid': '76561198041918145', 'num_games_owned': 178, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 285, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 285, 'last_played': 1625266798}
review:
If you like the movie, you'll enjoy this game. It's nothing amazing but the controls on Wall-E feel exactly how they should be and they do everything they can to make the most of what Wall-E is capable of.

You find items like he does in the movie, and each one rewards you with a funny little gag. The EVE sections involve you flying through a corridor and there's not much to it but it's fun. 

Beat the game in just about 5 hours. If you want a chill game about one of your favourite films, pick this up (when it's on sale!)

author: {'steamid': '76561198250383832', 'num_games_owned': 25, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 554, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 456, 'last_played': 1699675889}
review: out of all the games in the WALL-E game series, this takes the cake for the best movie game, all of WALL-E's mechanics and movement all feel like his actual mechanics and movement in the movie. I genuinely like the start of the game having to start years before the movie takes place with our WALL-E's life during the process of operation cleanup while the Axioms take off in the background and it being a diagnostic checkup to make sure they're working as intended (even if our WALL-E cheated by copying the one unit in front of him) and then giving us a sandbox in WALL-E's house to settle in with his mechanics and movement. even if some of the mechanics in the game were under used IE the laser, charm bot button, and our long lost friend the Buy N Large laser dispenser, they still added it in because it was part of the movie (the last one i don't think was in the movie but ill let that slide since there were a lot of dumb stuff on the last gen consoles). If you are in the search for a good WALL-E game, I recommend you get this game. despite the glitches and texture problems because of it being very old and the game being targeted towards kids. This game still has those movie parts and good mapping to allow more ideas with the move set given that some of the WALL-E games failed to do. I would also recommend getting this for a discount just to get the feel of it and so if you're not able to refund, it wouldn't be too bad.

author: {'steamid': '76561198189146339', 'num_games_owned': 342, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 51, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 23, 'last_played': 1624987665}

author: {'steamid': '76561198257529135', 'num_games_owned': 63, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 596, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 596, 'last_played': 1622314935}
review:
Só não digo "um clássico!" pois creio que eu sou um dos poucos que jogaram rsrs... todavia, não deixa de ser uma nostálgica aquisição para quem teve a oportunidade de experienciá-lo na época, mesmo considerando o preço alto para um jogo antigo.

Wall-e possui uma linda história, uma profunda lição de moral (principalmente no filme) e é um prato cheio para os fascinados por tecnologia. Por ser um jogo de [i]puzzles[/i], se for sua primeira vez, requer uma pequena atenção, mas nada que vá mais te frustar do que te divertir.

Uma das coisas que eu acho fantástico é o fato de não ser necessária uma única palavra para se entender a história: a maneira como foram tratadas as expressões e emoções dos robôs é tão detalhada que suprime qualquer necessidade de comunicação verbal. Não à toa recebeu dezenas de prêmios e indicações.

author: {'steamid': '76561198998358605', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 256, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 256, 'last_played': 1620847189}
review:
First of all, the game is okay. It may not be an amazing experience, but it is not trash either.
So if I feel that way, why am I not recommending it?

Well, one thing is the length. The game is about 4 - 5 hours long, with the later 5 hours only occuring if you get really really stuck. I finished it in about 4 hours and I gotta say, it was not worth the ~17€ I payed, mainly because there is little to no replay value after you've finished the story.

Another thing is the fact that, no matter how hard people try, movies don't translate well into games. In certain parts of this game you really notice that the game designers stretched the story in weird ways to squezze in the 24 levels this game has, especially in the first third of the game where Wall E is still on earth.

The controls are also a thing I need to talk about. If you don't have a controller, then you are going to have some troubles. It's extremly obvious that the controls were made for a controller and not the PC. I mean, seriously, F for the laser and Z for you're special ability? Those are pretty akward controls. And the sections where you control EVE? They are a nightmare without a controller. 

So, a short summary:
The game is fairly dated and short. But if you have a controller and the game is on sale, I don't see a problem to buy this game. But seriously 16€, (about 20 dollars) is a bit much for a game with 4 hours of levels and as good as no replay value. I recommend watching the movie instead if you're just here for the nostalgia like almost all other reviewers here.

author: {'steamid': '76561198298753711', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 47, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 47, 'last_played': 1590442852}
review:
Игра откуда-то из моего детства, которая ни разу не перестала быть классной за все прошедшие годы. Ей, между прочим почти 13 лет, и она до сих пор играбельна.

Сюжет полностью основан на одноименном мультике 2008 года. Планета Земля покрыта мусором чуть более, чем вся. Ничто живое на ней больше существовать не может, и человеки, чтобы особенно не напрягаться, выбрали свалить с нее, оставив убираться роботов. Вы - единственный оставшийся в живых робот - если так вообще можно сказать про робота. Пыльная буря разобрала остальных на детальки, но вы продолжаете упорно делать то, для чего вас создали - собирать мусор. И так вы его собираете, собираете, годами, десятилетиями... Пока на землю заваленную мусором - его все еще очень много, вы же тут один напрягаетесь - не прилетает красотка-робот нового поколения. Красотка ищет на земле признаки жизни - это знак, что человекам можно возвращаться ~~засирать планету~~ жить дальше.

Собственно, весь сюжет вы будете следовать за этой красоткой. Попутно, конечно же, спасете человечество, куда ж без этого. Милая, быстропроходимая игрушка, которая дает отличную возможность поностальгировать по ахгдежемой2007 и отвлечься от насущных забот года 2021.

author: {'steamid': '76561198090448941', 'num_games_owned': 304, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 558, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 41, 'last_played': 1618115285}
review:
Ich finde Es eine Frechheit von THQ Disney!!
Auf alle Plattformen, wo das Spiel erhältlich ist, gibt es die UNIVERSAL Version mit Deutsch, Englisch, Französisch und Spanisch Text und Ton, NUR bei STEAM haut man die Version OHNE Deutsch raus.
Dafür ist es nicht mal die 16,79€ Wert.
Tut mir leid aber ein Spiel das nicht vollkommen gleich auf ALLEN Plattformen ist, ist nicht mal 1 CENT wert!!!

Ich habe Das Spiel zufällig Bei Amazon (In Deutsch) gesehen und dachte mit das ich mir das kaufen muss.
Gesagt getan, habe ich es mir über ein 3.Händler für rund 1€ gekauft und musste dann beim Nachsehen auf Steam feststellen, dass der Publisher wieder mal Bockmist fabriziert hat.
Seit dem liegt das Spiel nur noch in meiner Steam-Bibliothek rum.

author: {'steamid': '76561198955036695', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 612, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 213, 'last_played': 1694992355}
review: This game is pretty good! It's a port of the Playstation 2 Asobo version and even though I like the Xbox 360 Heavy Iron version more I still enjoyed this game! The graphics are also really nice to me, during cutscenes you see a drop in quality but that's because they are videos and aren't playing out in game so I don't really mind it. For a licensed game this is excellent! But I do have a few complaints. The game drags on for way too long and so do levels, making the game get really repetitive after a while. The controls on PC kinda suck especially during the EVE missions but an easy fix is to just use a controller if you have one because luckily this game has controller support. This game is not worth 20 dollars but I recommend getting it when it is on sale.

author: {'steamid': '76561198862009890', 'num_games_owned': 430, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 816, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 816, 'last_played': 1617497010}
review:
Замечательная история о искренней любви двух роботов Валл-и и Евы и спасении какой-то там планеты... Любовь, которая спасла мир!
Всё начинается с того, что в один прекрасный день робот Валл-и остаётся совсем один и в детстве, когда я проходил игру меня так пугал этот момент! Момент, когда Валл-и так резко лишился всех и остался совсем один на земле... Но к счастью на всеми забытую землю приземляется летающий корабль, который в поисках хоть какой-то жизни на земле отправляет для этого робота Еву! Валл-и сразу же замечает новенького красивенького робота белого цвета, который был совершенно не похож на него самого! Кажется, как будто он  с первого взгляда влюбляется в Еву! Валл-и так долго был одинок, что он быстро решается привлечь внимание Евы!! После их знакомства, он привёл её в своё убежище и показал одну из его любименьких вещичек, а именно тот самый башмачок с росточком, который в будущем и спасёт всю нашу планету!
Вместе они пройдут очень трудный путь заботясь друг о друге и спасут друг друга ни раз! 
Казалось бы какая-то маленькая любовь двух роботов, но благодаря этой самой любви была спасена целая планета земля!
Никогда не бойтесь любить!!! Любовь, любовь... Она прекрасна, и даже если в итоге она не спасёт какую-то там планету! Ведь самое главное то, что она может осчастливить двух людей и даже роботов!!! <3

author: {'steamid': '76561198887916440', 'num_games_owned': 26, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 758, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 68, 'last_played': 1661808007}
review:
Теперь буду не кичиться и писать на русском языке, а то достал этот жёрман ваш...
Прошёл игру по WALL-E. Да-да, та самая, где Валли лепил кубы из дерьма и палок на каждой мусорке, и ты попутно проклинал все резкие повороты в гонках. Конечно, игра на компе далека от того наслаждения, которое я получал в свои 7 годиков, с открытым ртом залипая в PS2. Но диск с игрой приказал долго жить и сложился обзавёлся большущей царапиной при переезде. А он был так молод... Всего лишь 12 лет:steamsad: Управление на ПК перенесли также стабильно, как и всегда - то есть полный пэ. Но эту игру купят только те люди, у которых случился жёсткий приступ ностальгии, а таким людям всё нипочём. Не обошлось и без слёз с соплями на финальных титрах) Также во время прохождения было обнаружено такое количество скрытых и интересных деталей, что купите игру и сами всё увидите. Спасибо дымку за наличие данной игры!

author: {'steamid': '76561198131252662', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 289, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 284, 'last_played': 1675413715}
review:
Decent licensed game co-developed by Heavy Iron, who were responsible for the original Battle for Bikini Bottom.
Platforming levels are fun, with a focus on momentum-based traversal and puzzle-solving, but nearly half of the levels are brain-dead auto-scrollers where you just fire a laser at things or push forward. It is a game aimed at kids and made on the cheap, so I guess it's excusable.

Despite this being a fairly old PC port, I encountered no major technical issues playing it on a Windows 10 PC. However, the game's frame rate is uncapped and there's no V-Sync option in the game's config, so if you want a stable frame rate, you'll need to set V-Sync to Always On in your GPU control panel.

author: {'steamid': '76561198118532324', 'num_games_owned': 1025, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 1839, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1493, 'last_played': 1653132706}
review:
Достоинства: обворожительный главный герой; занятные, пусть и довольно таки простые головоломки; шикарный звукоряд в полном объеме перекочевал из полюбившегося нам мультфильма; увлекательный сетевой режим, рассчитанный на двух человек, сбалансированный игровой процесс.

Недостатки: любовная история, занимавшая ключевое место в первоисточнике, практически никак не передана; слишком мало по-настоящему интересных моментов, и все они чересчур коротки; камера порой выбирает не самые удачные ракурсы; в настройках игры отсутствует настройки графики.

Оценка: 6/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198422199704', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 431, 'playtime_forever': 689, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 689, 'last_played': 1608815177}
review:
Wall-E is still the best 3D anime Movie in my Heart even up till now. And this game, even though i played it long ago, still makes me gone and grab it here on steam out of nostalgia... But i glad i did... :3

This game is a lot more difficult than i remember, but it's rewarding. The story goes a little before Axiom took off to space and all the way to After the ending of the movie. Yes, we get to see what happen after the ending.

The game is aged however, so the cinematic and game textures turned up blurry. But still, even with those blur, this is still a great game with great story to tell. Even if you didn't watch the movie, the game covers enough to let you enjoy from the start to the end.

Honestly speaking, some changes in the game makes the whole Wall-E story more logical and exciting compared to the Movie. So those who watch the movie before will still be able to enjoy this game in a new perspective. But be warned.. it does require some skill to clear the game.. if you don't like extreme Parkour genre, this game might makes you cry.. :3

Skills required to clear this game:
[1] Puzzle solving
[2] Shooter (Shooting Genre)
[3] Parkour (Platforming + Time Limited Racing)
[4] Flight Navigating
[5] Road Crossing/River Crossing/Chicken Crossing

author: {'steamid': '76561198323588630', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 478, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 360, 'last_played': 1679772153}
review:
Great movie adaptation! You will certainly enjoy it if you have played the game or loved the movie when you were a kid. I had a blast playing through it again.
The video game adaptation of Wall E is a 3D game with mainly puzzle and parkour elements. As it mostly follows the plot of the movie, I would recommend watching the movie before you play the game. For a game from 2008 the graphics aged quite well. The music is appropriately used although the music itself is not that interesting. Except the songs from "Hello, Dolly !" which were used in the movie too, those were great and can stand on their own. The level design is good and has some really creative game mechanics. The game feels great when using a controller although I've heard that MKB controls aren't that great. 
Completing the game (not 100%) took me just 6 hours and considering the short length, the regular price (15 euros) seems quite steep.
I really recommend this game if you have good memories playing it when you were young or if you loved the movie. If not, it might still be worth the 15 euros if you are looking for a relatively easy 3D puzzle/parkour game.

author: {'steamid': '76561199055242516', 'num_games_owned': 22, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 616, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 616, 'last_played': 1605555578}
review:
7 years later, and it is still a masterpiece. I mean, why else would I come back to a game with outdated graphics and repetitive SFX after 10 years and ACTUALLY buy it?

I've 100%-ed the game in about 10 hours, and I really liked it, like, REALLY.
The music is a music to my ears, the graphics were outstanding back then, all levels are quite enjoyable (except Eve's Pursuit, f#ck THAT), the multiplayer is what I am to this day is fascinated by. I WILL recommend it, and the price is worth it. 

Good luck for now. Peace.

author: {'steamid': '76561198036551982', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 39, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 39, 'last_played': 1605500314}
review:
Although I dislike the game, mostly because I played the PS3 version a while back, I do think this is a good game objectively.

In of itself, the controls are a bit wonky to get used to, but they are alright and actually end up being quite smooth once you get that muscle memory for different things.

I'd personally recommend the PS3 or XBOX 360 version (even if you have to play on an emulator), but if it's unavailable this will provide a fitting substitute.

author: {'steamid': '76561198411934155', 'num_games_owned': 210, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 2289, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 932, 'last_played': 1653432173}
review:
Firstly, this game is my childhood. WALL-E was (and still is) my favorite movie of all time. I had this on my PS2 and it was definitely my most played game on that system, I had so much fun with it. So hearing that it was ported to Steam sounded like a dream come true.

However, in my opinion, the Steam port is less than optimal. Keyboard controls could be much better. For example, the button to play music (which is a crucial function in the main story) is mapped to Y, and must be held down to work. And the E, Q, and X buttons do nothing, so it could have easily been mapped to one of those. But this is just one example of this.

I think it is a very significant flaw. In my first runthrough of this version, I decided to push past it for nostalgia. But now I'd like to try and 100% it, and I just can't bring myself to do so. 

If you're willing to let it go for a nostalgia rush, or if you just enjoy the movie and wish to experience this, by all means do so. It's a relatively solid game otherwise. The controls could simply be much better.

EDIT: For best experience, use a controller to play this game. The controls are much more optimized for it, and it will make it much more fun.

EDIT 2: I've now been informed that it is possible to change the control scheme by going to the game folder, running GameSetup.exe, and changing the settings from there. While I'm glad there is a way to change it, I feel that the control scheme could have been handled much better by default.

author: {'steamid': '76561198049082084', 'num_games_owned': 368, 'num_reviews': 110, 'playtime_forever': 257, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 257, 'last_played': 1604522310}
review: Это она самая. У меня когда-то был тот самый синий диск с игрой, внутри которого была желтая книжечка. К сожалению, сам кейс от диска вместе с книжечкой куда-то пропали, остался только диск. В общем это та самая игра, в которую вы играли в детстве, только тут нету русского языка. Я взял игру на ст*м*ее за сотку, тут ценник что-то прям ну пипец дикий. В общем берите, пока она доступна в стиме. Мне кажется, ее может из стима рано или поздно уберут, как это было в свое время с анабиозом соном разума, да и вообще стим любит старые игры удалять из магазина.

author: {'steamid': '76561198310814361', 'num_games_owned': 331, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 8, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8, 'last_played': 1599413233}
review:
[h1] Далёкий 2010 год... [/h1]

 [b] Эх, помню свой 2010 год, где тогда у меня в доме появился первый компьютер и через некоторое время появился диск с этой замечательной игрой. Тогда, будучи малокососом, я играл в эту игру. Проходил обучение Buy N Large робота ВАЛЛ-И, разные головоломки, чтобы открывать закрытые места, миссия с космосом, кишащим огромным количеством мусора и другое. И сегодня, я расскажу свои оценки к этой игре в моём обзоре. Приятного чтения! [/b]

 [h1] Плюсы [/h1]

[b] 1. Графика. Графика в этой игре - прекрасная для тогда ж него 2008-ого года!
 2. Сюжет. Сюжет этой игры, как и сам сюжет фильма "ВАЛЛ-И" - прекрасный, но различается некоторыми моментами.
 3. Бонусы и мини-игры. В данной игре были добавлены некоторые бонусы, а именно - различные картинки с персонажами из фильма "ВАЛЛ-И", которые можно открыть по очкам, полученные по прохождению сюжета и мини-игр, видеозаставки, которые мы видим по сюжету игры, трейлер к фильму "ВАЛЛ-И" и заключительная заставка логотипа "Pixar", где ВАЛЛ-И меняет загоревшуюся лампочку у настольной лампы на новую, и после этого заменяет самого на себя на букву R, случайно обронившую её. У раздела "МИНИ-ИГРЫ" имеются два дополнительных раздела: ОДИН НА ОДИН (где первый игрок соревнуется со вторым игроком на общем разделительном экране) и ЧЕМПИОНАТ (где игрок, играя в разные режимы, сможет набрать любое количество очков для статистики и узнать, на каком месте он находится среди других игроков).
 4. Сувениры. В некоторых местах разных глав разбросаны различные сувениры, что если вы найдёте все сувениры в какой-нибудь одной главе, то вам будет прибавлено дополнительное количество очков. 
 5. Саундтрек. В каждой главе сопровождается различная музыка под атмосферой игры и дизайна уровня. Это дополняет атмосферу, что делая игру - ещё лучше! [/b]
 
 [h1] Минусы [/h1] 

 [b] 1. Камера. Она довольно очень неудобна, что через некоторое время, когда вы хотите насладиться хорошим видом в игре, камера может сама взять и встать в исходное положение, если вы были в течении первых секунд в неподвижном виде. Но сама камера особо не сильно раздражает, лично как для меня. [/b]

 [h1] Итог [/h1]

 [b] Я получил морю эмоций этой замечательной игры, даже спустя 10-ти лет после первого запуска. Я однозначно советую эту игру, несмотря на один минус и не жалея свои 435 рублей. Ностальгия моего детства) Оценка к игре: 10/10! [/b]
 
 [b] Спасибо за внимание! [/b]

author: {'steamid': '76561198960567522', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 41, 'playtime_forever': 131, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 19, 'last_played': 1663078424}

Questo gioco l'ho letteralmente ADORATO.

Io avevo la versione per PS2, un disco che ormai e distrutto da quanto l'ho usato. Penso come la maggior parte dei giocatori non hanno la play 2 dietro l'angolo, quindi è difficile rigiocarci.

Un giorno, mentre scorrevo nei giochi da 1€ e 5€ (lo so sono povero) ho trovato il dolcissimo sguardo di questo tenero robottino, e ho dovuto assolutamente comprarlo.

è il gioco della mia infanzia, non l'unico ma uno dei più speciali
